wikistories-extensiondesc: Wikistories lets editors create short, visual and reliable knowledge from Wikimedia projects
wikistories-beta-feature-description:
A tool that lets you select images & highlight facts from an article to create short, visual, and reliable knowledge from Wikipedia for quick consumption. Enable it to do the following:
- Discover stories attached to an article.
- Click/Tap on the [+] icon below the article title to create a new story.
wikistories-pref-showdiscovery-help-mess: Wikistories is a new feature that allows you to create short, story-like content using text and images from Wikipedia articles.
wikistories-recentchangesflags-legend: This is an edit to a Wikistory linked to an article
wikistories-rcfilters-hidewikistories-de: Edits to wikistories included on article pages
wikistories-specialstorybuilder-nojswarn: This special page requires JavaScript to work
wikistories-specialstorybuilder-mustbelo: Please log in or create an account to create stories
wikistories-specialstorybuilder-invalids: In the URL, specify an article to create a story about or the title of a story to edit. You need to include the story namespace too.
wikistories-story-edittext-medium: As you edit, please maintain original meaning of text
wikistories-story-edittext-last: Please avoid removing too much text
wikistories-confirmdialog-delete-message: It will be removed from your story permanently.
wikistories-confirmdialog-discardstory-m: You’ll lose any pages, images and text additions that you’ve made.
wikistories-confirmdialog-discardedits-m: You’ll lose any pages, images and text edits that you’ve made.
wikistories-toast-maxframes-addingmore: Each story can have a maximum of {{PLURAL:$1|$1 page|$1 pages}}. To add a new page, please delete an existing one.
wikistories-toast-maxframes-selecting: A maximum of {{PLURAL:$1|$1 image is |$1 images are}} allowed per story.
wikistories-error-notenoughframes-messag: All Wikistories need at least {{PLURAL:$1|1=one|2=two|3=three|4=four|5=five|10=ten|$1}} {{PLURAL:$1|page|pages}}. Please add {{PLURAL:$2|1=one|2=two|3=three|4=four|5=five|10=ten|$2}} {{PLURAL:$2|more page|more pages}}.
wikistories-error-frameswithouttext-mess: All Wikistory pages need text. Please add text to {{PLURAL:$1|$1 story page|$1 story pages}}.
wikistories-builder-article-not-availabl: Article text unavailable. Please try again later
wikistories-builder-publishform-info: Published stories will be available on the article page.
wikistories-builder-publishform-invalidt: A story with this title already exists. Please enter a new one.
wikistories-builder-publishform-saveerro: An error occured when publishing the Wikistory. Please try publishing it again.
wikistories-builder-licensing-with-terms: By continuing, you agree to the [$1 Terms of Use], and you irrevocably agree to release your contribution under the [$2 CC BY-SA 3.0] and [$3 GFDL] licenses.
wikistories-nojs-form-categories-label: Categories names, without the namespace, one per line
wikistories-nojs-viewer-error: $1 {{PLURAL:$1|image|images}} used in this story {{PLURAL:$1|is|are}} no longer available on Commons.
wikistories-nojs-viewer-no-article: Important! The article linked to this story is no longer available. You may need to delete the story to maintain accuracy.
wikistories-discover-cta-text-subheader: Be the first one to illustrate key facts about this topic for visual learners.
wikistories-not-enough-frames: The story does not have enough frames
wikistories-too-many-frames: The story has too many frames
wikistories-text-too-long: The text on frame #$1 is too long. It has {{PLURAL:$2|$2 character|$2 characters}} but the maximum allowed is $3.
wikistories-no-image-category-desc: One of the story frames has no image
wikistories-no-related-article-desc: The linked article of the Story is deleted
wikistories-outdated-text-category: Story has outdated text with regards to its source article
wikistories-outdated-text-category-desc: Some of the text used in this story is not present anymore in the source article
wikistories-notification-articlechanged-: $1 was edited and $2 needs to be reviewed
